website_summaries.verdict: Cloud Mountain's most powerful trolling motor offering 86 pounds of thrust for your fishing boat, kayak, inflatable, or dinghy.
pros: The ergonomic tiller on this motor has a telescoping feature to ensure comfort
long but fully adjustable with two quick motions
The battery indicator has ten LED displays so you get a highly accurate reading of how much power you have left
cons: Rarely, a unit slips through quality control that may not function as intended

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer made a fine motor and then scraped to save a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: The motor works perfectly, but there is a major flaw that makes this one to avoid. None of the bolts, including the ones for attaching the motor to the transom are made of stainless steel. I had mine out for the first time a few days ago and then this morning I took it out only to discover that all of the screws and bolts were rusting badly. What a mess! The manufacturer made a fine motor and then scraped to save a couple of dollars by using easily rusting metal for the essential hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stephens

customer_reviews.title: ... motor a couple of times now and I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've used the trolling motor a couple of times now and I'm very happy with it. It's very easy to use and the telescoping tiller handle is handy. I have plenty of power when going into a moderate wind with the motor set on 5. I would give the trolling motor five stars except I've been unable to locate a replacement propeller in the event I should damage the provided prop. Otherwise, a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mountainmandan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great motor for our raft
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Intex excursion 5. The motor moved us around a small lake very well. I already have a nick in the prop and I could not find a replacement from Cloud Mountain so I will have to find another after market prop. I am really happy with the purchase so far. It is just as advertised. It has a higher output than recommended for the motor mount so I will have to put an extension on it because it pulls the mount down, it is that powerful.
customer_reviews.author: minus_sanity

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL AND USES VERY LITTLE BATTERY LIFE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a kayak -- very powerful and responsive and uses very little battery life. Don't want to spend all your time recharging your battery. Battery life is shown on the motor, too. What more could you ask -- oh yes, good price!
customer_reviews.author: Stockton Bear

customer_reviews.title: Poor return policies!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return motor. It was to small. Have not heard from Cold Mountain on refund. It's been a month.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with 55 Lb thrust for our 15 foot Gheenoe. Overkill I know but I wanted plenty of power for our tiny boat. Had to attach it to the side of the boat at the bow because we have the gas motor on the back. Works great! Have used it several times without issue. It is quiet and I like the extending gear handle. Saves my back from having to lean over.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Baby

customer_reviews.title: The Electric Motor for Small Boats
customer_reviews.text: Like ? Everything about this little creature. The price was right, the delivery on time (love that Amazon Prime)....and the kids get a faster and easier to handle motor for the small aluminum boat...and they are thrilled with it. Best buy I made this week. Thanks Cloud Mountain....for replacing my old 55 lb pusher...with your 86 lb better pusher.
customer_reviews.author: TheCatAgain

customer_reviews.title: He was very pleased with its performance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband at his request as a secondary motor for his small fishing boat. He was very pleased with its performance. It's not really powerful but it's an electric trolling motor and is not meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Shopper

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: good for the price , the mounting should not be made of plastic ,,we will see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: rick harris

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than expected - note the weight so you are not surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I expected, but I am equating that to quality. To be determined with MUCH use. Product was shipped excellent. Great protection, great instructions, not over packed, not under packed. Well thought out. I have a feeling this is going to be very much enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Motor comes without any name on it or model #. In the manual, no name, manufacture, model number etc. Nothing. No lights after fully charged. Amazon did the right thing though and credited me and return.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to paddling
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and put on our canoe. We have taken it on several camping trips and it works great to putt around the lakes.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Wombat

customer_reviews.title: I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: I got a lemon. Out of the box forward 1-3 was the same speed, 4 was slower, then 5 was same as 1-3. All 3 reverse speeds were the same. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: MT Shootin'

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ !
customer_reviews.text: This motor kicks ass ! Love it on my Goplus 10’ inflateable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boy

customer_reviews.title: Way cheaper but just as good.
customer_reviews.text: Rugged construction and lots of power for my 16 foot double ended rowing and sailing boat.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Confusing specs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not yet unpacked this motor, and seeing displayed on the motor “24 volts”. The item description is confusing. In one place it states 86lbs of thrust at 24 volts. Another says unit can be adjusted to 60lbs of thrust using 12 volts. Is this true? If so, I like the versatility and will keep it. If not, I’ll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Great motor, it's cheap and runs very good
customer_reviews.text: Great motor, it's cheap and runs very good. I put it on a 12ft fishing kayak and it is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our small boat. Could have come with alagtor clips.
customer_reviews.author: judy brewer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly but it’s so plastic. I also ordered a shaft too small.
customer_reviews.author: Coralie Mosby Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: Great power for my outrigger canoe. Twice the thrust as the name brand trolling motors for the same money.
customer_reviews.author: Miccol

customer_reviews.title: Boat
customer_reviews.text: Works great but dont fit the boat it says it suppose to
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with propeller pin. How do I get one ?
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Great motor.
customer_reviews.text: A great trolling motor for my little boat. Super power on # 5.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: put this 86lb thrust on my 20ft pontoon boat no problem pushing it any where I want to go I recommend it to others I will buy another one if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the thrust. I don’t like having to use 2 batteries for 24 volt power
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hochgesang

customer_reviews.title: Runs great
customer_reviews.text: Boxed well , connected to boat 24v battery. runs good getting 3 mph in my 16 foot pontoon twice as fast as original electric motor
customer_reviews.author: charles lemay

customer_reviews.title: I guess the only thing I would like is if the handle is a little longer
customer_reviews.text: This motor is light and quiet!!! I have not get a chance to use the full power yet since I have an inflatable and it's only rated for 35 lbs thrust. I guess the only thing I would like is if the handle is a little longer. Love it so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: colloid03

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice motor great price, I need it to power my 17.5 aluminum boat around
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice electric motor I could afford. I just wish it came with a weedless prop.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Gift for hubby. He used it the whole vacation and had lots of fun fishing
customer_reviews.author: TERRI

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I have the cloud Mountain 60 on my 8.5 ft. Sundolphin Sportsman. It pushes that boat quietly at over 4 mph. Battery indicator lights are a little hard to read. Oh well, nothings perfect. A guy in a canoe asked if I could pull a skier. I said yes. But, he would never come up out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Denny C

customer_reviews.title: One week in the salt air, and the hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: One week in the salt air, and the hardware is already showing signs of rust, and it's not even in the water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my dad, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S. Hight

customer_reviews.title: 00 and the motor is great. But the transum mount slips when turning sharp
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be okay. I be installed a motor controller for$18.00 and the motor is great. But the transum mount slips when turning sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, Well made. Not really any different than the more expensive Minn Kota 40lb. thrust. I would buy again although I doubt I will have to.
customer_reviews.author: dennis bool

customer_reviews.title: Good power,  gears are off position
customer_reviews.text: Updated Got a replacement today will try it out tomorrow. Customer service was great. 3 position if off on it. You have you find it between 2 and 3. When you do find it, it moves. I upgraded from a 44 lb trust and forward 3 is a little slow then 5 in my old one, 5 really moves my 12 for fiberglass. The positioning levers are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Leeroy Theriault

customer_reviews.title: works great. use it to power my 12 ft pontoon ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. use it to power my 12 ft pontoon boat around on my 5 acre pond.
customer_reviews.author: bearcol

customer_reviews.title: Don't mess with a Vet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst motor I have ever purchased the throttle handle broke the first time out. I contacted the company when I returned from my vacation. The company told me they where sorry for the problem I had with the motor. That's all they did. They are a sorry excuse for a company. I will let all my friend at the local VFW know and warn other Vetaren know what kind of company you operate. Beware of this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: so good. I'm happy if it holds
customer_reviews.text: Had on water twice, so far...so good. I'm happy if it holds up
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it runs realy well not as quite as I though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cloud Mountain 36/40/46/50/55/60/86 LBS Thrust 8 Speed Electric Trolling Motor for Fishing Boats Saltwater Transom Mounted with Adjustable Handle
feature_bullets: 【Powerful and Durable】: Reinforced Nylon Bracket ensures high strength, good ablation resistance and good dimension stability. Durable all aluminum head increase the service life of the motor.
【Ergonomic extendable handle】: 8 Speeds and 6-inch Telescoping adjustable Handle (5-sp forward & 3-sp reverse) puts total control at your fingertips for a smooth and easily controlled ride.

【28-inch Fiberglass Composite Shaft】: High tensile strength and corrosion resistance adjustable shaft allows for proper depth placement in all water conditions. 28” shaft is more suitable for sitting.
【10-Point LED Battery indicator】: Battery indicator protects the batteries, and it is convenient to observe how much electricity is left.(battery not included)
【Stainless steel Hardware】: Saltwater compatible hardware make the motor can run perfectly in saltwater or freshwater.
